message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm willing to part with it for $9,500.
I'm really interested in the product, but $9,500 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I'm eager to make a deal, $8,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget at $9,000. Would you be willing to go down to $8,750?
